section.heading: Time for performance of acts when last day falls on Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday.

content.p: Effective 5/10/2016 59-10-518. Time for performance of acts when last day falls on Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday. (1) As used in this section, "legal holiday" means a legal holiday in this state. (2) If the last day prescribed under authority of this chapter for performing any act falls on Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday, the performance of the act shall be considered to be timely if it is performed on the next succeeding day which is not a Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday. (3) For purposes of this section, the last day for the performance of any act shall be determined by including any authorized extension of time. Amended by Chapter 87 , 2016 General Session
As used in this section, "legal holiday" means a legal holiday in this state.

If the last day prescribed under authority of this chapter for performing any act falls on Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday, the performance of the act shall be considered to be timely if it is performed on the next succeeding day which is not a Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday.
For purposes of this section, the last day for the performance of any act shall be determined by including any authorized extension of time.
